channel.title: emacs on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in emacs on Long Thoughts

item.title: Making Emacs recognize its physical location
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: My emacs now behaves differently when I’m at home! This enables me to have my private configuration loaded automatically when needed, while I have all my work-settings enabled otherwise.

item.title: Blogging Setup: Workflow for writing a new blogpost
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Creating a new blog post using the previously describe setup should be easy and comfortable. These are the generic steps for adding a blog-post.

item.title: Setting up the blog
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: A quick howto on how I used Hugo to setup this blog.
